camera_levels.name: Awakening
camera_levels.poetic: First light touches the lens of perception...
camera_levels.achievement: Caught the first glimmer of vision.
camera_levels.tooltip: Bare awareness. Faint shapes stir in shadow.

camera_levels.name: Aware
camera_levels.poetic: Depth emerges from flatness. The world begins to take shape.
camera_levels.achievement: Stepped into focus. The scene finds its dimension.
camera_levels.tooltip: Basic vision. Depth and form become known.

camera_levels.name: Insight
camera_levels.poetic: Movement weaves meaning into sight. Clarity sharpens.
camera_levels.achievement: The camera flows. You sense purpose in each motion.

camera_levels.name: Lucid
camera_levels.poetic: All is illuminated—color, shape, and shadow. The lens becomes the world's memory.
camera_levels.tooltip: Vivid, adaptive view. The world is alive in your gaze.

camera_levels.name: Transcendent
camera_levels.poetic: The camera dances with time. Reality bends, new truths emerge.
camera_levels.achievement: Crossed the threshold—beyond sight, you shape reality.
camera_levels.tooltip: See beyond surfaces. Camera is muse and mirror.

camera_levels.name: Infinite
camera_levels.poetic: Every angle is possible. The eye dreams as the world remakes itself.
camera_levels.tooltip: All perspectives at once. The cosmos is your camera.

camera_quotes: To look is human; to see is divine.
Every frame is a memory. Every memory, a universe.
The camera sleeps, and the world is lost. It wakes, and all is found.
Perspective is the soul's fingerprint.
A single pan can change a story.
Depth is a promise: there is always more.
What you focus on becomes real.
To tilt is to question gravity itself.
Through the lens, light reveals secrets.
Sometimes, the camera blinks. Sometimes, it dreams.
What's hidden in shadow waits to be seen.
Zoom out to find context. Zoom in to find meaning.
The lens is never truly empty.
Your gaze carves space into place.
Every cut is a choice. Every choice, a new path.
Let the camera wander—you may follow.
To see from above is to become the sky.
The bravest view is the first.
Where the eye cannot go, imagination leads.
Focus is not always about clarity—sometimes it is about intention.

camera_achievements.title: Dreaming in Darkness
camera_achievements.description: You have found the hidden silence before vision stirs.

camera_achievements.title: Blink of Dawn
camera_achievements.description: You witnessed the camera's awakening—a world waits beyond.

camera_achievements.title: Sightfinder
camera_achievements.description: Depth and shape returned to your field of view.

camera_achievements.title: Focus Weaver
camera_achievements.description: You followed the movement, capturing the story between frames.

camera_achievements.title: Lucid Lens
camera_achievements.description: You achieved full lucidity—see as creation itself sees.

camera_achievements.title: Reality Bender
camera_achievements.description: You transcended the usual—your vision shapes the scene.

camera_achievements.title: Infinite Gaze
camera_achievements.description: The cosmos flows through your lens. All views, all at once.

tutorial.intro: Welcome to the Camera Consciousness System. Here, your view evolves as your awareness deepens.
tutorial.how_it_works: Each consciousness level unlocks new camera abilities—sharper focus, wider angles, dynamic movement, and even world-bending vision.
tips: Look for subtle changes in color and clarity as you progress.
Your camera's consciousness determines how much of the world you can perceive—and shape.
Level up by exploring, observing, and interacting with new perspectives.
Achievements reward bold, creative use of the camera.
Use <kbd>Tab</kbd> or <kbd>G</kbd> to shift awareness—try every level!
Read loading tips for poetic insight and camera mastery.
You can always review your current level and abilities in the Camera menu.
